MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 14-OCT-2020 07:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the EH26 postcode area of Penicuik. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.30PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of damaged electrical equipment on our underground cable network on Carlops Road. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.11AM on 14th October 2020.
